Day 1 - March 18, 2022: Arrival in New York City (NYC)
- Morning: Depart from Denver International Airport (DEN) on Flight F3543246 to NYC. Estimated travel time is 4 hours and 33 minutes.
  - Estimated arrival at John F. Kennedy International Airport (JFK) around 12:10 PM local time.
- Afternoon: Check into the hotel, have lunch at a nearby Indian restaurant, and rest from the journey.
- Evening: Explore Times Square, enjoy dinner at a Mexican restaurant, and watch a Broadway show.

Day 2 - March 19, 2022: Sightseeing in NYC
- Morning: Visit Central Park, have breakfast at a nearby café, and rent bikes to explore the park.
- Afternoon: Head to Midtown Manhattan for lunch at an Indian restaurant, then visit the Empire State Building and Rockefeller Center.
- Evening: Have dinner at a Mexican restaurant in Greenwich Village and enjoy live music or comedy at a nearby venue.

Day 3 - March 20, 2022: Buffalo, New York
- Morning: Depart NYC for Buffalo via train or car rental (self-driving or taxi). Estimated travel time is around 6 hours.
  - If driving/taking a taxi, consider stopping for lunch along the way at an Indian restaurant.
- Afternoon: Arrive in Buffalo and check into the hotel. Explore the city's waterfront and visit the Buffalo History Museum.
- Evening: Enjoy dinner at a Mexican restaurant in downtown Buffalo.

Day 4 - March 21, 2022: Niagara Falls and return to NYC
- Morning: Depart for Niagara Falls via car rental or tour bus (approximately 30 minutes from Buffalo). Spend the morning exploring the falls.
- Afternoon: Have lunch at a nearby restaurant, then return to Buffalo. If driving/taking a taxi, consider stopping for dinner along the way at an Indian restaurant.
- Evening: Arrive back in NYC and spend the night relaxing or exploring local neighborhoods.

Day 5 - March 22, 2022: Departure from NYC to Denver
- Morning: Check out of the hotel and have breakfast at a nearby café. Depart for JFK Airport for your return flight F3894714 to DEN, which departs at 1:58 PM local time.
  - Estimated arrival in Denver around 5:28 PM local time.

Estimated total cost: $6,245 (excluding hotel and some meals)
